results.title: The cardioselective and hypotensive effects of bisoprolol in hypertensive asthmatics.
results.text_hl: An equipotent @GENE_ADRB1 @GENE_153 @@@beta 1-adrenoceptor@@@-blocking dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (100 mg), compared with 10 and 20 mg @CHEMICAL_Bisoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017298 @@@bisoprolol@@@, was found to increase airway resistance in the population of @<m>DISEASE_Status_Asthmaticus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013224 @@@asthmatic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ studied.
